mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FESTIVAL ( CONTENT_ID, PROGRAM, EVENT_EXP, SPONSOR, USETIME_FESTIVAL, EVENT_START_DATE, EVENT_END_DATE ) VALUES ( #{contentId}, #{program}, #{eventExp}, #{sponsor}, #{usetimeFestival}, #{eventStartDate}, #{eventEndDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_FESTIVAL SET PROGRAM = #{program}, EVENT_EXP = #{eventExp}, SPONSOR = #{sponsor}, USETIME_FESTIVAL = #{usetimeFestival}, EVENT_START_DATE = #{eventStartDate}, EVENT_END_DATE = #{eventEndDate} WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
